content: this is a pattern for embellishment to go on existing t-shirt the method is to crochet an edging and then sew it onto the hem and sleeves dmc traditions crochet cotton 400yrds/366m 1 90 oz/ 54g 5800 sky blue - 1 ball crochet hook size b 2 25 mm gauge 1 pinwheel = 1 3 row of edging = 1 1 blue t-shirt sewing pins sewing needle sewing thread to match traditions color
